name: Sarthak Gupta
about: I’m a first-year Computer Science Engineering student at BITS Goa, interested in web development , competitive programming and AI/ML. I’m excited to learn and grow through my studies and campus activities. I’m looking for opportunities to help me build my skills. Feel free to connect if you have any opportunities or want to discuss anything!
